title: Episode 75 - PyeongChang 2018 Day 16 & Closing Ceremony Review + PyeongChang Wrap
itunes:title: Episode 75 - PyeongChang 2018 Day 16 & Closing Ceremony Review + PyeongChang Wrap
description: Well all good things must come to an end and sadly PyeongChang 2018 is over. But does that mean we're going to stop and not bring you our review and recap of the final day and closing ceremony? Of course now! How crap was the closing ceremony? What is the deal with kids? What is the deal with kids who can project their voice so far? Where the hell was Psy? Are we looking forward to Beijing? Is Thomas Bach still speaking? Why is Ben now besties with Edwina Bartholomew? And where do these games rank in the minds of your beloved trio of hosts? It's time to listen, extinguish the flame and get the tissues out as we close out the games of the 23rd winter Olympiad in style!
